feed.title: ScalingBitcoin 2015: Retarget - Call For Proposals Now Open

entry.title: ScalingBitcoin 2015: Retarget - Call For Proposals Now Open
entry.summary: The Call for Proposals (CFP) for 'Scaling Bitcoin 2016: Retarget' has been announced and is now open. The event is scheduled to be held in Milan on October 8th and 9th. Interested applicants can submit their proposals until September 2nd, after which the applicant acceptance notification deadline is September 23rd. For more details, interested parties may visit https://scalingbitcoin.org.
